reviews.title: Pub Lunch
reviews.text: An ok wee place with friendly staff. We visited for lunch and it was fairly busy - lunch was fine, nicely presented.

reviews.title: Great karaoke night
reviews.text: We visited for a few drinks and a bite to eat. My 18 year od daughter was very excited when she spotted it was also karaoke night! The food portions were huge and great value. The staff were very professional and asked for my daughter's ID which she showed. They apologised profusely but we understood they were only doing their job. It was supposed to be a quick visit but we ended up there until closing time. It was a fun night and the DJ was entertaining. It was always busy and it was easy to see why it's so popular.

We booked in for the Enchanted Forest Menu before heading on to the bus leaving from the Fisher's Hotel. First impressions were good - decor and ambiance - and I was expecting some 'posh nosh' from the good choice on the menu.
reviews.title: Enchanted Forest Menu Disappointment
Reasonable food but terrible service
reviews.text: Nosh was not posh! Everything we had (all 3 choices of starters) looked like it was right out of a packet or tin - and tasted like it too!

reviews.title: Good food
reviews.text: On a plus the service was quick and efficient so we made it on to the bus in plenty of time.
